home.meta.title: Victor de Alcântara Bueno — Portfolio
home.meta.description: Software engineer. I build web and mobile products focused on performance, UX, and pragmatic engineering.
home.hero.tagline_prefix: I build web and mobile products focused on
home.hero.microcopy: Selected projects with focus on performance, UX, and delivery.
home.about.p1: I work across front-end, back-end, and mobile, prioritizing architecture clarity, accessibility, and product metrics.
home.about.p2: I’ve worked on private production systems and open-source initiatives, always aiming to reduce friction and increase delivery predictability.
home.about.p3: Technologies I use often: Astro/React, TypeScript, Flutter, and API stacks focused on consistency and observability.
home.contact.p: If you have a project and want to talk about scope, risks, and next steps, reach out.
